text: hello how are you?
I'm good. How is your day going?
good. Would you like to donate to help save the children?
I don't think I am currently able to give anything.
what do you mean? why not?
Things are so tight at home that I can barely make things work as it is.
seriously? You can't even donate 0-2 dollars for other kids?
Not if it takes away from my own kids that are my responsibility.
what about the kids that really need it though? why don't you think about them?
Well I am thinking about them. I don't really know what kids this is even going to though.
but people donate all the time without knowing who it is going to
Well that seems silly. You wouldn't know if your money is going to a child or some random people's pocket.
can you please donate? one of the children in this group is my child
Well that doesn't really legitmize the operation.
how about just a dollar?
I would need to know what organization it was going to.
here: Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.
What percentage of the donation actually goes towards helping the children?
one hundred percent; why would someone take that money for themselves?
Because all organizations take a percentage to pay for overhead costs.
how about just 75 cents then?
No I won't be contributing today .
